customer

Class DateSelectionCtrl

  • java.lang.Object
    • customer.DateSelectionCtrl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class DateSelectionCtrl
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This is the controller class of the movie selection page. The user here can select a specific day they want, choose a movie available that day and then choose a specific time available
    Author:
    Dimitris Selalmazidis

      DateSelectionCtrl() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void back(javafx.event.ActionEvent Event)
      This method is linked with the back button and moves the user to the previous screen
      void bookNow(javafx.event.ActionEvent Event)
      This method loads the Seat Selection page after the user has chosen a movie, a date and a time
      boolean checkIfMovietimeHasPassed(int screeningID)
      This method takes as input the ScreeningID and calculates whether the specific Screening has already been displayed
      void chooseDate()
      This method changed shows the available movies for a specific day the user has chosen
      void chooseMovie()
      This method updates the picture and the description of the movie that the user picks and updated the Time field with the available screening times of this movie
      static java.lang.String dateToIntDate(java.lang.String date)
      This method takes a date as a String and returns it to the form 1/1/2018 (and not 01/01/2018).
      void initialize(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
      This method is initializing the date-selection page.
      void logout(javafx.event.ActionEvent Event)
      This method is linked with the logout button and logs out the user
